attributes.action: Accept our apology as a nation and friend of the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As an American, I am embarrassed by the lack of consideration and tact on the part of our government during your recent visit.  We appreciate your very thoughtful gesture and gift of historical significance.  We should have been equally thoughtful.  Of all things American, we would hate for our best representation to be a couple dozen Hollywood hits.  Is that really what America has been reduced to?  Cheap toys and bootleg DVDs from China?

We value your friendship and camaraderie.  You are our most important ally.  Please accept this petition for forgiveness on behalf of all the embarrassed Americans.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
